ygData.subject: [ANN] First release of a HDFS writer processor for Heritrix

Subject: [ANN] First release of a HDFS writer processor for Heritrix
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281; y=0Xh0wF6uvEuFor6z3QFUOPWEdx3Tn5iFLAQrmlZKSs3sUusZhGimBWvd

--------------090806090904080306060408
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Doug Judd of Zvents has contributed an HDFS Writer Processor.  This 
processor writes crawled content directly to a Hadoop Distributed File 
System (HDFS) as Hadoop SequenceFiles rather than as Internet Archive 
ARCs to local disk. The SequenceFiles are made up of records keyed by 
URL whose value is a compound of crawled page content, request headers, 
response header, and crawl metadata.  To learn more about this new 
addition, see Doug's README: http://www.zvents.com/hdfs/README.txt 
<http://www.zvents.com/hdfs/README.txt>.  To download visit 
http://www.zvents.com/labs/hdfs_writer_processor 
<http://www.zvents.com/labs/hdfs_writer_processor> (For more on the 
Hadoop platform, see http://lucene.apache.org/hadoop 
<http://lucene.apache.org/hadoop>).

St.Ack

--------------090806090904080306060408
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1

Doug Judd of Zvents has contributed an HDFS Writer Processor.  This
processor writes crawled content directly to a Hadoop Distributed File
System (HDFS) as Hadoop SequenceFiles rather than as Internet Archive
ARCs to local disk. The SequenceFiles are made up of records keyed by
URL whose value is a compound of crawled page content, request headers,
response header, and crawl metadata.  To learn more about this new
addition, see Doug's README: <a
 onclick="return top.js.OpenExtLink(window,event,this)"
 href="http://www.zvents.com/hdfs/README.txt" target="_blank">http://www.zvents.com/hdfs<wbr>/README.txt</a>.
 To download visit <a
 onclick="return top.js.OpenExtLink(window,event,this)"
 href="http://www.zvents.com/labs/hdfs_writer_processor" target="_blank">http://www.zvents.com/labs<wbr>/hdfs_writer_processor</a>
(For more on the Hadoop platform, see <a
 onclick="return top.js.OpenExtLink(window,event,this)"
 href="http://lucene.apache.org/hadoop" target="_blank">http://lucene.apache.org<wbr>/hadoop</a>).<br>
<br>
St.Ack
